mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mydiary (user_idx, date, weather, nation, title, abroad, location, text, main_img) VALUES (#{user_idx},#{date},#{weather},#{nation},#{title},#{abroad},#{location},#{text},#{main_img})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mydiary WHERE user_idx=#{user_idx}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mydiary WHERE user_idx=#{user_idx} AND nation LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nation}, '%')
